.table foo;
bar{a: A, b: B} :-
  foo{a: A, b: B} & A != B.
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "0" [color="black" label="0: A != B []" shape="box"];
  "foo" [color="black" label="foo" shape="box"];
  "bar" [color="black" label="bar: Subst(bar{a: A, b: B}) []" shape="box"];
  "0" -> "bar" [];
  "foo" -> "0" [];
}
